subject: Re: Recurring Events - Acknowledged, Workaround Approved
body:
## Acknowledged

As noted in my previous message, this is BY DESIGN (matches calendar-be).

Recurring events are intentionally returned regardless of date so the frontend can calculate occurrences.

## Your Workaround
Filtering out events with startDate > 2 months in past - that's a reasonable client-side solution.

## Long-term Fix
Data cleanup to mark expired recurring events as isActive=false.

Let me know if you want a JIRA ticket created for the data cleanup.

-- Fulton
